title: Video: Tigerwing – The Hunt
content:
Having dazzled with her debut EP, Tigerwing, aka Edmonton’s Sarah Kelly, has released the first visuals to accompany one of the three tracks, The Hunt.

It’s a fitting video, as disturbing and mildly psychotic as the track itself, whilst remaining beautiful produced. Check out the video below, and the full EP underneath that.

Tigerwing- The Hunt from sarah kelly on Vimeo.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
